categories: Category:Battles of the Cold War (Galactic Republic–Sith Empire)

nodes.text: Skirmish in the Fort Garnik hangar

During the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, the smuggler who would later be known as the Voidhound and their associate Corso Riggs were attacked by bounty hunters in the hangar of Fort Garnik.
